name: Arsenal Training Experience
shortDescription: Train at the iconic Arsenal FC — one of football’s most successful clubs — with expert coaches, exclusive access, and unforgettable experiences at Emirates Stadium and beyond.
programOverview: Step into the world of champions with the Arsenal Football Experience — an exclusive opportunity to train at one of the most iconic and successful clubs in world football. Led by Arsenal Football Development Coaches, participants will refine their skills using the same principles and philosophies that have shaped generations of Premier League greats. Beyond elite coaching sessions, enjoy behind-the-scenes access to the Emirates Stadium, a Q&A with former players, and unforgettable cultural excursions across London. This is more than training — it’s your chance to live the Arsenal legacy and experience football excellence at its source. Train under official Arsenal Football Development Coaches. Exclusive guided tours of the Emirates Stadium and Arsenal Museum. Meet and learn from former Arsenal players or managers. Receive an official adidas Arsenal tour kit. Experience professional matches and London sightseeing.
programHighlights: High quality accommodation and full-board meals.
Q & A with a former player or manager.

itinerary.title: Travel
itinerary.description: Flight. Overnight flights to London.

itinerary.title: Arrival + Training Block 1
itinerary.description: Arrive London, meet Tour Director at airport, airport transfer, hotel check-in. Lunch and orientation meeting. Arsenal coaching in afternoon. Evening dinner.

itinerary.title: Sightseeing + Match
itinerary.description: London City Tour. Premier League Match 1.

itinerary.title: Training Block 2
itinerary.description: Arsenal coaching in morning. Stadium Tour, Q&A with former Player in afternoon. Evening fixture.

itinerary.title: Training Block 3 + Fixture 1
itinerary.description: Arsenal coaching in morning. London Bus Tour. Evening Fixture.

itinerary.title: Arsenal Sightseeing + Training Block 4
itinerary.description: Highbury Tour. Emirates Tour / Arsenal Museum. Arsenal coaching in evening.

itinerary.title: Training Block 5 + Tour
itinerary.description: Arsenal coaching in morning. Wembley Tour. Evening team dinner

itinerary.title: Training Block 6 + Match
itinerary.description: Arsenal coaching in morning. Lunch awards ceremony. Premier League Match.

itinerary.title: Travel
itinerary.description: Departure from London, airport transfers

developmentFocus.fixtures: With Axis Football Tours, teams enjoy thrilling fixtures against carefully matched local opponents, tailored by age and ability. Every match is fully organised — with pitch hire, referees, and all travel costs included — for a seamless, professional experience. For an even greater challenge, we can also arrange entry into international tournaments, giving players the unforgettable experience of competing in a global football environment against teams from around the world.
developmentFocus.training: Teams travelling with Axis Football will have the exclusive opportunity to be trained by coaches from local professional club academies. All players will be given a Player Development Plan (PDP) highlighting an improvement plan regardless of the level they are currently at.
developmentFocus.classroom: All Axis Football Tours benefit from purposeful classroom development sessions, designed to enhance understanding beyond the pitch. Whether analysing match footage, exploring tactical principles, engaging in Q&A discussions with professional players, or strengthening team identity through workshops, these sessions ensure every player grows technically, tactically, and personally as part of their tour experience.
developmentFocus.teamBonding: At Axis Football Tours, team bonding is central to every itinerary. We create purposeful moments that build trust, communication, and resilience — strengthening the connections that drive performance. Through shared experiences, group challenges, and guided reflection, players develop deeper understanding of one another, enhancing unity on and off the pitch.

accommodationMealsSafety.accommodation: With Axis Football Tours, every detail of your stay is designed to match the prestige of your football experience. We’ve partnered with a handpicked collection of exceptional hotels across the globe — each offering first-class comfort, style, and amenities perfectly suited to your team’s needs. Our accommodations are carefully selected for their prime locations — whether steps away from elite training facilities or set within resort-style complexes offering outstanding sports and leisure options. Every property meets our rigorous standards for quality, safety, and service, ensuring a seamless and inspiring experience from check-in to check-out. We believe your surroundings should elevate your performance. That’s why we exclusively feature premium 3 and 4-star hotels, chosen to provide superior comfort and a touch of luxury throughout your tour.Typically based on 2–4 persons sharing, your full-board package includes delicious, nutritious meals — with lunches served at the hotel or training complex, and evening dining experiences either at your accommodation or a quality local restaurant. (Comparable alternatives may occasionally be used if your featured hotel is unavailable.)
accommodationMealsSafety.meals: We have half and full board options for travelling groups depending on your needs. We recommend the full board for most of our groups knowing that you have everything taken care of on site.
accommodationMealsSafety.playerSafety: We only work with accredited partners ensuring you have a safe and stress-free tour. Risk assessments are completed for all our tours and support is provided 24/7 by our team and on the ground with your very own Tour Director.

name: Tottenham Hotspur Coaching Experience
shortDescription: Train with Tottenham Hotspur, reigning Europa League Champions, at one of football’s most dynamic clubs — world-class coaching, exclusive access, and unforgettable moments at the stunning Tottenham Hotspur Stadium.
programOverview: Immerse yourself in Europa League Champions, Tottenham Hotspur Football with this incredible experience — your chance to train, play, and live like a Premier League star. Led by Tottenham Hotspur Global Development Coaches, you’ll take your skills to the next level, learning the fast, attacking style that defines the Spurs identity. From unforgettable training sessions and exclusive behind-the-scenes access to exploring the spectacular Tottenham Hotspur Stadium, this is an opportunity bursting with energy, inspiration, and true football magic. Experience what it means to train the Spurs way — where talent, teamwork, and ambition come together. Train with official Tottenham Hotspur Global Development Coaches. Step inside the incredible Tottenham Hotspur Stadium and Club Museum. Experience Premier League matchdays and live London’s energy. Meet and learn from former Spurs players. Take home your official Nike Tottenham tour kit.
programHighlights: Train with Tottenham Hotspur Global Development Coaches
Over 24 hours of elite coaching across five days
Competitive fixtures against local opposition teams
Q&A with a former Spurs player or coach
Tottenham Hotspur Stadium and Club Museum tour
Official Nike Tottenham Hotspur tour kit
Exciting evening activities and team events
High quality accommodation and full-board meals

itinerary.description: Arsenal coaching in morning. Stadium Tour, Q&A with former Player in afternoon. Evening fixture.

name: Glasgow Celtic Experience
shortDescription: Experience Celtic FC — first British European champions in 1967 — and train where passion echoes through Paradise, home to one of football’s most famous atmospheres.
programOverview: Step into the spirit of champions with the Celtic Football Experience — a rare opportunity to train at one of the most storied and passionately supported clubs in world football. Led by Celtic FC Academy Coaches, participants will develop their game through the same training philosophies that have shaped generations of Celtic stars. Alongside high-level coaching, you’ll enjoy exclusive behind-the-scenes access to Celtic Park (Paradise) — one of the largest and most atmospheric stadiums in the UK — plus a Q&A with former players and memorable cultural experiences across Glasgow. This is more than training — it’s your chance to feel the Celtic identity, embrace its history, and grow your game at the club where football is a way of life. Train under official Celtic FC Academy Coaches. Exclusive guided tour of Celtic Park and the Celtic Museum. Meet and learn from former Celtic players or coaches. Receive an official Celtic training kit. Experience professional matches and explore Glasgow’s rich football culture.
programHighlights: Train under official Celtic FC Academy Coaches.
Exclusive Celtic Park (Paradise) and Club Museum stadium experience.
Insight session or Q&A with a former Celtic player.
Take home your official Celtic training kit.
Enjoy a structured programme focused on technical and personal development.
Matches arranged against suitably matched local opposition.
High-quality accommodation and full-board meals included.
All local transport and excursions arranged for your group.
Performance review and development feedback provided.

itinerary.title: Travel
itinerary.description: Flight. Overnight flights to Edinburgh.

itinerary.title: Arrival + Training Block 1
itinerary.description: Arrive in Glasgow, meet Tour Director at airport. Airport transfer and hotel check-in. Lunch and welcome/orientation meeting. Celtic Academy coaching session in the afternoon. Evening dinner.

itinerary.title: Sightseeing + Match
itinerary.description: Glasgow City Tour including George Square, River Clyde & West End. Attend Scottish Premiership Match (subject to schedule and availability). Evening team discussion.

itinerary.title: Training Block 2
itinerary.description: Celtic Academy coaching in the morning. Celtic Park (Paradise) Stadium Tour + Club Museum visit. Q&A with a former Celtic player in the afternoon. Evening free time or optional swimming recovery.

itinerary.title: Training Block 3 + Fixture 1
itinerary.description: Celtic Academy coaching in the morning. Glasgow Mural & Street Art Walking Tour in the afternoon. Evening match vs local Scottish opposition.

itinerary.title: Sightseeing + Training Block 4
itinerary.description: Visit Celtic Training Centre (Lennoxtown) for guided tour. Celtic Academy coaching session at training ground or local facility. Evening bowling, cinema, or team bonding activity.

itinerary.title: Training Block 5 + Tour
itinerary.description: Celtic Academy coaching in the morning. Afternoon visit to Hampden Park — Scottish National Stadium Tour. Evening group dinner in Glasgow.

itinerary.title: Training Block 6 + Fixture 2
itinerary.description: Celtic Academy coaching in morning. Afternoon team preparation session/video analysis. Evening match vs local Scottish opponents. Awards dinner.

itinerary.title: Travel
itinerary.description: Departure from Edinburgh, airport transfers.

name: Benfica Training Experience
shortDescription: An exclusive Lisbon football development experience: train with academy coaches from Benfica, Sporting CP, and Estoril, and compete against hand-selected local teams in a professional, world-class environment.
programOverview: Experience world-class player development in one of Europe’s most prestigious football cities with the Lisbon Elite Training Experience. Train under professional academy coaches from Benfica, Sporting CP, and Estoril — clubs renowned globally for producing top talent. Across high-intensity training sessions, technical development blocks, and tactical workshops, players will learn the same methods that shape Portugal’s rising stars. Alongside training, enjoy behind-the-scenes access at iconic stadiums, cultural exploration of Lisbon, and competitive fixtures against carefully matched local opponents. This is more than a tour — it’s an opportunity to grow, compete, and learn in a city where football excellence is a way of life. Train with official academy coaches from Benfica, Sporting CP, and Estoril. Exclusive stadium tours and insight into Portuguese player development. Competitive matches against local opposition matched by age and level. Full tour kit and high-quality accommodation included. Cultural experiences showcasing Lisbon’s vibrant heritage.
programHighlights: Professional training sessions led by Benfica academy coaches
Competitive fixtures against local Portuguese opposition (age and level matched)
Exclusive stadium tours and behind-the-scenes club experiences.
All training facility access, pitch hire, and equipment.
Local transport for all activities, matches, and excursions.
Cultural and sightseeing experiences across Lisbon.
Tour Director support throughout for logistics and coordination.
End-of-tour performance review and recognition for players.

itinerary.title: Travel
itinerary.description: Flight. Overnight flights to Lisbon.

itinerary.title: Training Block 2 + Fixture 1
itinerary.description: Morning training by Benfica coaches. Afternoon team bonding games. Evening fixture versus local opponent.

itinerary.title: Sightseeing + Training Block 3
itinerary.description: Morning City Tour including Benfica Stadium and Museum tour. Afternoon training session with Benfica coaches. Team dinner.

itinerary.title: Training Block 4 + Sightseeing
itinerary.description: Morning training with Benfica coaches. Lunch. Afternoon José Alvalade Stadium tour and Museum.

itinerary.title: Training Block 5 + Fixture 2
itinerary.description: Morning training session with Sporting Lisbon coaches. Afternoon beach trip. Evening fixture versus local opponent.

itinerary.title: Training Block 6
itinerary.description: Visit to Foot Lab. Afternoon training session with Sporting Lisbon coaches. Team dinner.

itinerary.title: Training Block 7 + Fixture 3 + Awards dinner.
itinerary.description: Morning training by Sporting Lisbon coaches. Lunch at stadium. Evening fixture versus local opponent. Evening awards dinner.

itinerary.title: Travel
itinerary.description: Depart from Lisbon, airport transfers.

name: Villarreal Training Experience
shortDescription: Arrive in Barcelona and train with Villarreal, 2021 Europa League champions. Train at the academy near the iconic Estadio de la Cerámica. This tour also includes FC Barcelona Camp Nou stadium tours and carefully curated cultural tour axross the mesmerising Barcelona city.
programOverview: Experience elite player development with the Villarreal Training Camp — a unique opportunity to learn from the expert academy coaches of the 2021 Europa League champions. Training sessions follow the same methodology used to develop top La Liga talent, ensuring technical progression, tactical awareness, and real on-field confidence. Beyond the pitch, explore the culture and beauty of Barcelona, discovering its iconic architecture, vibrant streets, and world-famous cuisine. Enjoy guided visits to the legendary Camp Nou and Valencia’s Mestalla Stadium, witnessing the passion that defines Spanish football. This is where development, culture, and unforgettable football moments come together. Train with official Villarreal Academy Coaches. Tour Camp Nou and Mestalla Stadium. Explore Barcelona’s architecture and cultural landmarks. Enjoy authentic Spanish dining experiences. High-quality accommodation, transport, and full support throughout.
programHighlights: Elite training sessions delivered by official Villarreal Academy Coaches.
Competitive fixtures against age- and level-matched Spanish opposition.
High-quality hotel accommodation with full-board meals.
All training facility access, pitch hire, and equipment.
Private coach transport for all activities, matches, and excursions.
Barcelona city cultural experiences and sightseeing tours.
Official tour training kit for players.
Dedicated Tour Director support for full trip coordination.

itinerary.title: Travel
itinerary.description: Flight. Overnight flights to Barcelona.

itinerary.title: Arrival + Training Block 1
itinerary.description: Arrive Barcelona, meet Tour Director. Private coach transfer to Villarreal accommodation & check-in. Lunch and orientation briefing. First Villarreal Academy coaching session in the afternoon. Evening dinner.

itinerary.title: Cultural Experience + La Liga Match
itinerary.description: Barcelona City Tour — Gothic Quarter, La Rambla, Sagrada Família exterior. Attend La Liga Match 1 (Villarreal if home, or alternative top-flight fixture depending on schedule). Evening team talk and reflection.

itinerary.title: Training Block 2
itinerary.description: Villarreal Academy coaching in the morning. Guided Estadio de la Cerámica stadium tour and club museum. Q&A with former Villarreal player or academy staff in afternoon. Evening free time or recovery walk.

itinerary.title: Training Block 3 + Fixture 1
itinerary.description: Morning training session with Villarreal coaches. Afternoon visit to Castellón old town or local beach break. Evening fixture vs regional Spanish opposition (age/level matched)

itinerary.title: Training Block 4 + Barcelona Experience
itinerary.description: Return to Barcelona for full-day cultural and sightseeing exploration. Evening group dinner in the city before returning to Villarreal.

itinerary.title: Training Block 5 + Stadium Tour
itinerary.description: Villarreal Academy coaching in the morning. Transfer to Valencia for a guided Mestalla Stadium Tour. Evening bowling, cinema or team bonding activity.

itinerary.title: Training Block 6 + Fixture 2 + Awards Dinner
itinerary.description: Morning match preparation and tactical session. Evening fixture vs local Spanish club (age/level appropriate). Awards dinner.

itinerary.title: Travel
itinerary.description: Depart from Barcelona, airport transfers.

name: Juventus Training Experience
shortDescription: Train at Juventus, Italy’s most decorated club, defined by unrivalled Serie A dominance and European pedigree. Elite coaching, exclusive access, and a prestigious football development experience in Turin.
programOverview: Step into the legacy of European greatness with the Juventus Elite Training Experience — an extraordinary opportunity to develop your game at one of the most successful clubs in world football. Led by Juventus Academy Coaches, players will refine technique, decision-making, and tactical awareness using the same philosophy that has shaped generations of Italian and European champions. Enjoy exclusive behind-the-scenes access to the Allianz Stadium and Juventus Museum, meet former players, and experience the culture and passion of Turin. This is more than training — it’s your chance to immerse yourself in the Juventus identity and grow within a club built on excellence. Train with official Juventus Academy Coaches. Exclusive Allianz Stadium and Juventus Museum guided tour. Q&A session with a former Juventus player or coach. Receive an official Juventus training kit. Experience professional matches and explore Turin’s rich football heritage.
programHighlights: Professional training sessions led by official Juventus Academy Coaches.
Exclusive Allianz Stadium and Juventus Museum tour.
Q&A session with a former Juventus player or club representative.
Competitive fixtures against age and level-appropriate Italian opposition.
Official Juventus training kit for all players.
High-quality hotel accommodation with full-board meals.
All training pitch access, equipment, and facility fees included.
Local transportation for training, matches, and excursions.
Dedicated Tour Director support throughout the trip

itinerary.title: Travel
itinerary.description: Flight. Overnight flights to Turin.

itinerary.title: Arrival + Training Block 1
itinerary.description: Arrive in Turin, meet Tour Director at airport. Airport transfer and hotel check-in. Lunch and orientation meeting. Juventus Academy coaching session in the afternoon. Evening dinner.

itinerary.title: City Sightseeing + Match
itinerary.description: Turin City Tour — Piazza Castello, Mole Antonelliana, and historic centre. Attend Serie A Match 1 (Juventus home fixture or alternative Serie A game depending on schedule). Evening team discussion.

itinerary.title: Training Block 2
itinerary.description: Juventus Academy coaching session in the morning. Allianz Stadium + Juventus Museum Tour in the afternoon. Q&A session with a former Juventus player. Evening free time.

itinerary.title: Training Block 3 + Fixture 1
itinerary.description: Juventus Academy coaching session in the morning. Afternoon visit to Montemario or Parco del Valentino for sightseeing and team walk. Evening match vs local Italian opposition.

itinerary.title: Training Block 4 + Cultural Experience
itinerary.description: Juventus Academy coaching session at training complex. Afternoon Chocolate and Gelato Tasting Tour (Turin’s artisan tradition). Evening bowling or cinema team activity.

itinerary.title: Training Block 5 + Day Trip
itinerary.description: Juventus Academy coaching session in the morning. Afternoon trip to Milan or Lake Como for cultural exploration. Evening team dinner in Turin.

itinerary.title: Training Block 6 + Fixture 2 + Awards Dinner
itinerary.description: Juventus Academy coaching and match preparation session. Evening match vs local Italian opposition (age/level matched). Awards dinner.

itinerary.title: Travel
itinerary.description: Depart from Turin, airport transfers.

Our accommodations are carefully selected for their prime locations — whether steps away from elite training facilities or set within resort-style complexes offering outstanding sports and leisure options. Every property meets our rigorous standards for quality, safety, and service, ensuring a seamless and inspiring experience from check-in to check-out. We believe your surroundings should elevate your performance. That’s why we exclusively feature premium 3 and 4-star hotels, chosen to provide superior comfort and a touch of luxury throughout your tour.Typically based on 2–4 persons sharing, your full-board package includes delicious, nutritious meals — with lunches served at the hotel or training complex, and evening dining experiences either at your accommodation or a quality local restaurant. (Comparable alternatives may occasionally be used if your featured hotel is unavailable.)
accommodationMealsSafety.meals: We have half and full board options for travelling groups depending on your needs. We recommend the full board for most of our groups knowing that you have everything taken care of on site.
accommodationMealsSafety.playerSafety: We only work with accredited partners ensuring you have a safe and stress-free tour. Risk assessments are completed for all our tours and support is provided 24/7 by our team and on the ground with your very own Tour Director.

name: Rangers Girls FC Training Experience
shortDescription: Girls only opportunity to train with Rangers FC Women at one of Europe’s most historic clubs, developing your game where pride, resilience and European glory are part of the identity.
programOverview: Step into the legacy of European greatness with the Juventus Elite Training Experience — an extraordinary opportunity to develop your game at one of the most successful clubs in world football. Led by Juventus Academy Coaches, players will refine technique, decision-making, and tactical awareness using the same philosophy that has shaped generations of Italian and European champions. Enjoy exclusive behind-the-scenes access to the Allianz Stadium and Juventus Museum, meet former players, and experience the culture and passion of Turin. This is more than training — it’s your chance to immerse yourself in the Juventus identity and grow within a club built on excellence. Train with official Juventus Academy Coaches. Exclusive Allianz Stadium and Juventus Museum guided tour. Q&A session with a former Juventus player or coach. Receive an official Juventus training kit. Experience professional matches and explore Turin’s rich football heritage.
programHighlights: High level professional training sessions led by Rangers FC Women’s Academy Coaches.
Exclusive Ibrox Stadium and Club Museum tour.
Q&A session with current or former Rangers Women players.
Competitive fixtures against age- and level-matched Scottish opposition.
Official Rangers tour training kit for players.
High-quality hotel accommodation with full-board meals.
All training facilities, pitch hire, and equipment included.
Private coach transport for all scheduled activities and excursions.
Glasgow city cultural experiences and sightseeing activities.
Dedicated Tour Director for full trip coordination and support.

itinerary.title: Travel
itinerary.description: Overnight flights to Edinburgh.

itinerary.title: Arrival + Training Block 1
itinerary.description: Arrive in Glasgow and meet Tour Director. Private coach transfer to accommodation and check-in. Lunch and welcome orientation. First training session at the Rangers Training Centre. Evening dinner.

itinerary.title: Glasgow City + Match Day Experience
itinerary.description: Glasgow City Tour — Riverside Museum, Kelvingrove, Merchant City. Attend a Scottish Women’s Premier League match (Rangers Women if home / alternative fixture if necessary). Evening team reflection session.

itinerary.title: Training Block 2
itinerary.description: Rangers Women’s Academy coaching in the morning. Ibrox Stadium & Club Heritage Tour in the afternoon. Evening free time or light recovery walk.

itinerary.title: Training Block 3 + Fixture 1
itinerary.description: Morning technical and tactical session with Rangers coaching staff. Afternoon visit to Loch Lomond for sightseeing and team bonding. Evening fixture vs local Scottish girls’/women’s team (age/level matched).

itinerary.title: Performance Development + Cultural Experience
itinerary.description: Morning workshop: team cohesion, leadership & resilience. Afternoon visit to The Burrell Collection or Glasgow Science Centre. Evening group meal in the city.

itinerary.title: Training Block 5 + Day Trip
itinerary.description: Rangers coaching session at Training Centre. Day trip to Edinburgh — Royal Mile, Castle exterior, Princes Street Gardens. Evening return to Glasgow.

itinerary.title: Training Block 6 + Fixture 2 + Awards Dinner
itinerary.description: Juventus Academy coaching and match preparation session. Evening match vs local Italian opposition (age/level matched). Awards dinner.

itinerary.title: Travel
itinerary.description: Depart from Turin, airport transfers.

developmentFocus.fixtures: With Axis Football Tours, teams enjoy thrilling fixtures against carefully matched local opponents, tailored by age and ability. Every match is fully organised — with pitch hire, referees, and all travel costs included — for a seamless, professional experience. For an even greater challenge, we can also arrange entry into international tournaments, giving players the unforgettable experience of competing in a global football environment against teams from around the world.
developmentFocus.training: Teams travelling with Axis Football will have the exclusive opportunity to be trained by coaches from local professional club academies. All players will be given a Player Development Plan (PDP) highlighting an improvement plan regardless of the level they are currently at.
developmentFocus.classroom: All Axis Football Tours benefit from purposeful classroom development sessions, designed to enhance understanding beyond the pitch. Whether analysing match footage, exploring tactical principles, engaging in Q&A discussions with professional players, or strengthening team identity through workshops, these sessions ensure every player grows technically, tactically, and personally as part of their tour experience.
developmentFocus.teamBonding: At Axis Football Tours, team bonding is central to every itinerary. We create purposeful moments that build trust, communication, and resilience — strengthening the connections that drive performance. Through shared experiences, group challenges, and guided reflection, players develop deeper understanding of one another, enhancing unity on and off the pitch.

name: Mediterranean Sports Village
shortDescription: Mediterranean Sports Hub offers top-class football training facilities in Salou, Spain. 11 pitches, modern stadium, accommodation, and amenities for elite team camps.
programOverview: Mediterranean Sport Village is a premier football training camp venue, offering top-class facilities including multiple natural and artificial grass pitches, a modern stadium, and professional amenities. Based in Salou, it provides excellent accommodation options, meeting rooms, and recovery areas for teams. The complex is ideal for pre-season training, tournaments, and international camps, ensuring an outstanding environment for player development and team preparation.

itinerary.title: Travel
itinerary.description: Flight to Barcelona.

itinerary.title: Training Block 1
itinerary.description: Arrive in Barcelona and meet Tour Director. Breakfast/lunch in hotel. Private team meeting. Afternoon training session. Gym. Rest -Pool/beach. Team dinner.

itinerary.title: Fixture 1
itinerary.description: Breakfast at hotel. Light morning session. Lunch. Team meeting. Travel to venue. Team dinner.

itinerary.title: Sightseeing
itinerary.description: Breakfast at hotel. Travel to Barcelona. Stadium tour of Camp Nou. Academy Tour. Information session with Barcelona coaches. Return to hotel. Free time/ leisurely dinner in Salou.

itinerary.title: Training Block 2 & 3
itinerary.description: Breakfast in hotel. Team meeting. Morning Training Session. Lunch. Gym. Afternoon session. Rest - pool/ beach. Team dinner. Evening entertainment.

itinerary.title: Fixture 2
itinerary.description: Breakfast at hotel. Light morning session. Lunch. Team meeting. Travel to venue. Team dinner.

itinerary.title: Training Block 3 & 4
itinerary.description: Breakfast at hotel. Team meeting. Morning Training Session. Lunch. Gym. Afternoon session. Rest - pool/ beach. Team dinner. Evening entertainment.

itinerary.title: Training Block 5
itinerary.description: Morning session + video analysis or matches. Visit PortAventura. Awards dinner.

itinerary.title: Travel
itinerary.description: Departure from Barcelona.

name: Royal Verd
shortDescription: Royalverd Training Center offers elite football training, privacy, and comfort with three FIFA pitches, in scenic La Garrotxa, Girona
programOverview: Royalverd Training Center is located in Vall d’en Bas, Girona, within the scenic La Garrotxa Natural Reserve. The facility features three FIFA-regulation football pitches and specialized training areas to support elite team preparation. Its accommodation options include modern, well-equipped rooms, catering for both double and junior suite needs, all designed to deliver high standards of comfort and flexibility for professional football groups. The center is renowned for hosting top clubs in a peaceful natural setting, making it ideal for intensive football camps and preseason training.

name: Tenerife Top Training
shortDescription: Tenerife Top Training offers elite football camps with two natural grass pitches, advanced gyms, pools, and recovery facilities in sunny southern Tenerife.
programOverview: Tenerife Top Training is a premier high-performance sports center in Europe, specializing in personalized football training camps for professional teams. It features two world-class natural grass pitches (with lighting for night sessions), dedicated goalkeeper training zones, and advanced fitness and recovery facilities—including gyms, heated pools, massage areas, and rehabilitation equipment. Flexible packages, experienced staff, and comprehensive support services such as airport transfers, meeting rooms, and leisure activities ensure an optimal experience. The center hosts clubs, youth camps, and conferences, delivering tailored solutions in a top-quality environment for athletes at all levels.

name: Hotel L'Azure
shortDescription: Hotel L'Azure offers elite sports facilities: Olympic pool, multiple pitches, multisport centre, quality gyms, close accommodation, and year-round mild climate.
programOverview: Lloret de Mar boasts a state-of-the-art sports zone featuring an Olympic-size swimming pool, multiple natural grass football pitches, and a multi-level sports centre with top-tier gym, athletics, and courts for tennis, basketball, and more. The facilities cater to various team and individual sports, all within close proximity, supported by quality accommodation and regeneration amenities, making it a premier multi-sport destination on the Costa Brava for clubs, camps, and training events year-round.

name: Hotel Touring
shortDescription: Hotel Touring Franciacorta offers modern rooms, wellness spa, outdoor pool, conference spaces, and full-size football pitch with sports amenities for teams.
programOverview: Hotel Touring Franciacorta is a modern 4-star hotel located near Milan and Lake Iseo, offering 83 well-equipped rooms, large meeting spaces, a restaurant, bar, Spa, and outdoor pool. For sports guests, the facility features a full-size natural grass football pitch, changing rooms, a five-a-side pitch, tennis court, gym, jacuzzi, sauna, and provides exclusive packages for professional training camps, with additional pitches available nearby—making it an ideal base for football teams and athletes seeking comfort and comprehensive amenities.
